capabilities.description: Diskover is able to chown files.

capabilities.description: Diskover is able to bypass permission checks for it's sub-processes.

capabilities.description: Diskover is able to bypass permission checks.
capabilities.name: DAC_OVERRIDE

capabilities.description: Diskover is able to kill processes.

capabilities.description: Diskover is able to set group ID for it's sub-processes.
capabilities.name: SETGID

capabilities.description: Diskover is able to set user ID for it's sub-processes.
capabilities.name: SETUID

attrs.label: Cron Schedule

The cron schedule for indexing data. </br>
Until the first run, the diskover data will display an error page.

1.3.12.readme:
Diskover Data

Diskover Data is used to monitor size/volumes of distributed dataset.
